parameters: The door requires a password to open it.
Behind the door, a staircase going downward appears. We can't see the bottom of the staircase.
Do you want to go down there to investigate?
Do you want to go down there to investigate?
A red umbrella dripping with water.
A red umbrella dripping with water.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Ms. Chen, is it possible that the passcode is Fangfang's birthday?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]This was the first thing I thought of, but it didn't work.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Oh right, Ms. Chen, the calendar says 'Gift from Qinghe Branch of Agricultural Development Bank.'
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Did anyone in the Tian family work in a bank before?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Fangfang's grandfather, Tian Xiangrong, used to work in a bank and was laid off a few years ago.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]...Have you heard any rumors about Tian Xiangrong?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I did hear some older teachers talk about him.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]They said Tian Xiangrong was very rich, but the source of his money was unknown.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]There were even rumors that Tian Xiangrong \c[1]resold cultural relics\c[0].
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]He obtained cultural relics from others and sold them to the bank's major clients.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]The people in town thought that Tian Xiangrong sold the belongings of the dead and ran into \c[1]Debt of the Deceased \c[0],
\c[2] Lin Lixun \c[0]What is this, Ms. Chen?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]This place is weird, the room layout seems to be changing constantly.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]But I remember the pattern on this door.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Fangfang had a \c[1]diary\c[0], this pattern was on the cover page.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]And this door has a combination lock just like her diary.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]This was my student's privacy, of course I don't know.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]...Maybe there are clues that can help us open this door, I'll look for them.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Fangfang was a student I cared about very much.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I want to know what Fangfang and her family went through.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]If you're afraid that I might destroy the scene...
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]It's okay, Ms. Chen, I also want to know the Tian family's past.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]You have been in Qingtan Town longer than I have, you should know better.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I'll do my best to answer whatever you want to know.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]No secrets will remain undiscovered in this little town.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Well, Ms. Chen, thanks for your cooperation.
You can obtain more clues by investigating some places again.
